class_notes:
Special Topic: Astrobiology & Exoplanets


Freshman seminar, for first year students only. This seminar is on astrobiology: the study of life in the context of the universe. While astrobiology is a diverse field and topics discussed in the seminar are varied, the primary focus of the seminar is on the planets and moons of our own solar system that could host other lifeforms as well as the characterization and detection of life on distant exoplanets.
course_description: Freshman seminar, for first year students only. Variable topics.
